content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Very well, Mr. Schmidt. I am a student, and I'm looking for a place that's both smart and economical. I'm not easily tricked, and I always follow moral and ethical standards. I'd like to be on good terms with my landlord, so I hope we can find a fair price for this newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's close to all important facilities, which is a great advantage. How much are you looking to rent it for?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I am looking to rent it for 1200 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see, Mr. Schmidt. 1200 Euro per month is quite a high price for a student like me. Is there any room for negotiation? I'm willing to pay a fair price, but I need to be mindful of my budget as a student.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your concern, but 1200 Euro per month is the lowest I can go. I believe it's a fair price for such a prime location and the quality of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your stance, Mr. Schmidt. However, as a student, I'm looking for a price that aligns with my budget. I'm not in a position to pay 1200 Euro per month. Is there anything else we can discuss?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but it seems we have reached an impasse. I understand your budget as a student, but I also believe the location and quality of the apartment are worth the 1200 Euro per month. If you're not willing to consider that price, I'm afraid we won't be able to come to an agreement. Thank you for your time, Mr. Abbasi.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for your time as well, Mr. Schmidt. I hope you find a tenant who can appreciate the value of your apartment. Good day to you.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
